meta.description: Maximize the number of patients whose temperature can be taken using electronic and regular thermometers with time and accuracy constraints.

sets.name: THERMOMETERS
sets.description: Types of thermometers available for taking temperature.

params.name: time_per_patient
params.description: Time in minutes required to take temperature with each type of thermometer.

params.name: total_time_available
params.description: Total time available in minutes for taking temperatures.

vars.name: patients_checked
vars.description: Number of patients checked with each type of thermometer.

objective.name: max_patients_checked
objective.description: Maximize the total number of patients whose temperature is taken.

constraints.name: time_constraint
constraints.description: Total time used by both thermometers should not exceed available time.

constraints.name: accuracy_constraint
constraints.description: At least twice as many patients should be checked by the electronic thermometer than the regular one.

constraints.name: regular_minimum_constraint
constraints.description: At least 50 patients should be checked by the regular thermometer.
